metadata.title: CVE-2021-31322 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: Telegram Android <7.1.0 (2090), Telegram iOS <7.1, and Telegram macOS <7.1 are affected by a Heap Buffer Overflow in the LOTGradient::populate function of their custom fork of the rlottie library. A remote attacker might be able to access heap memory out-of-bounds on a victim device via a malicious animated sticker.

criterions.comment: rlottie package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
